Is it bad that Ive stopped fantasizing about my boyfriend and started fantasizing about different ways to get rid of my boss I cant stand him.. PERIOD

Both of you removed my best friend  me off of Facebook  Okay you win You really showed us huh...Sure

So I just sharted and it was the single most horrifying experience in my life

All I can say is you better be thanking your lucky stars you got out of Aycock when you did PERIOD If I would have seen your skanky overly tan butt before you left for summer break I would have beat you all the way back to PA

You want a girl who likes hockey shotgunning beers and lacks both manners and basic  Sorry youre right Im not the girl for you PERIOD Good luck keeping the frat house pee free next year

I would totally skin Kristen Stewart alive with NO remorse if it meant I got to touch R Patz or Taylor Launter PERIOD

Ive spent my summer watching Spongebob and talking to a block of cheddar cheese PERIOD When does class start again

We can stay up late swap manly stories and in the morning Im makin WAFFLES

I just put my pizza in the toaster but turned on the microwave PERIOD When the microwave beeped I opened it to find it empty then ran around the house panicking and looking for my pizza PERIOD It was in the toaster PERIOD Im an idiot PERIOD

Why do professors always ask  and then get pissed off when you tell them

Thank God that Orientation is beginning PERIOD Now the dining halls will make real food PERIOD

As I get older marriage looks less and less appealing PERIOD

The ParamoreNo Doubt concert was AMAZING

Let you go Hahahahaha Thats the funniest thing Ive heard in a long time PERIOD You see I dont hold onto crap and last time I checked you are a pretty big piece PERIOD

Dear professor you are boring and cruel PERIOD This is summer PERIOD Chillax a bit
